description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying product details, including static parameter generation, fetching product data from an API, and rendering the product information along with an image component. It also includes functions for static site generation and component definitions for image display.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Pre-generates product [id] params for static export by fetching products from the backend.

methods.name: getProduct
methods.description: Fetches product data by id from the backend API.
